title: I hope Dr.Mundo will be in the new roadmap
body:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/6b/Dr._Mundo_Render.png/revision/latest?cb=20150720023350
One of the oldest champions in the game , kit outdated , ingame model outdated ( aka pizza feet)  , ubalanced or total useless .I see soooo much potential in this champion (:  *fingers crossed* hope i will see him in the roadmap .
